item.description:
Spring is coming so let's go dancing!

We will be going to Havana Club, one of the hottest salsa night spot in town at Central Square. There will be free beginner and intermediate lesson available at 9pm. For the absolute beginner, I also suggest you take the Rueda class at 8pm which is like line dancing for Salsa. If you want to brush up on your salsa skills before the 20th, MIT Salsa Club also offers free beginner lesson every Monday at 7pm.

http://web.mit.edu/sa...

Havana Club is a 21+ club with a $12 entrance fee. The place is easily assessable via T and have ample public parking ($1/hr) next door. Link is as follow:

http://havanaclubsals...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa (not the eating kind)
